subject: p12530259
History: -year-old male status post bronchoscopy with biopsy, rule out pneumothorax.
Findings: Portable upright chest radiograph demonstrates a known left hilar mass. There is no effusion, or definite pneumothorax. The cardiac silhouette and mediastinal contours are otherwise unremarkable.
Impression: No pneumothorax status post biopsy of known left hilar mass.
